# datasetSize

## Summary

Captures the size of the dataset.


## Description

Captures how large a dataset is.

The size is to be measured in bytes.


## Metadata

`https://spdx.org/rdf/3.0.0/terms/Dataset/datasetSize`


| | |
|---|---|
| Name | datasetSize |
| Nature | DataProperty |
| Range | xsd:nonNegativeInteger |
